title: Poster, "He Who Stops Being Better Stops Being Good, IBM Excellence Plus", ca. 1985
signed: Imprinted on sheet, upper right corner:  Design: Paul Rand
inscribed: Imprinted upper right corner:  Design: Paul Rand; along lower right edge, verticle (facing in):  IBM Excellence Plus
description: Two circles (red above and black) on gray ground. Imprinted in staggered letters, to the left of the circles: "He / who / stops / being / better / stops / being / good" / Oliver Cromwell (in a smaller font).

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "He Who Stops Being Better Stops Being Good, IBM Excellence Plus", ca. 1985.
ca. 1985. Offset Lithograph. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-32.
